record1.<1>:
Declare Function Msg, start_window, Utility, Dialog_Box, Repository, Get_Status, Repository
Declare Subroutine End_Dialog, Set_Status


Parent = Get_Property(@window, 'PARENT')

*---
* shorthand syntax for Get_Property
* the next line is equivalent to SELECTION = GET_PROPERTY(CtrlEntID, 'SELECTION')
*---
selection = @CtrlEntID->selection
text      = @CtrlEntID->text
list_ex   = @CtrlEntID->list_ex
selpos_ex = @CtrlEntID->selpos_ex


if selpos_ex<3> = 0 else return 0

item = trim(text)

begin case
	case item = 'Customer Listing (Using Report Builder)'
		*---
		* run the report builder report using the OR_view subdirectory
		*---
				
		set_status(0)
		entid = 'EXAMPLES*OIREPORT*RBLAYOUT*CUSTOMER_PHONE_LISTING'
		result = Repository("EXECUTE", entid)
		If Get_Status(ErrCode) then
		  call msg(@window, 'Error Message returned: ' : ErrCode)
		end
	case item = 'Create Custom Reports (Report Builder)'
		*---
		* Fire up the ORMAIN window using start_window
		*---
		x = Start_Window('ORMAIN32', Parent, '', '')
	case item = 'Orders (Using OIPI)'
		*---
		* fire up this report using the Wizard
		*---		
		x = Dialog_Box("ORDERS_REPORTS", parent, "")
		End_Dialog("ORDERS_REPORTS")
end case

RETURN 0
